name: Sites Content
description: This element represent a content block of variable type. The possible types are represented by corresponding elements each. The element named "selected" identifies the actual block content item of the corresponding type. To support an additional block content type, you need to add a corresponding element of that type and a corresponding option value in the "selected" element definition.

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Button"
elements.label: Button

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Devider"
elements.label: Divider

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites HTML"
elements.label: HTML

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Sites"
elements.label: Image

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites HB Image"
elements.label: HB Image

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Image And Text"
elements.label: Image And Text

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Promotion"
elements.label: Promotion

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Social Follow"
elements.label: Social Follow

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Spacer"
elements.label: Spacer

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Text"
elements.label: Text

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites HB Text"
elements.label: HB Text

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Link Bar"
elements.label: Link Bar

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Sites Video"
elements.label: Video

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is of type "Page Card"
elements.label: Page Card

elements.helpText: The element holding the block content if the block is a shared block
elements.label: reference

elements.helpText: This element identifies the element that holds actual block content for this item.
elements.label: selected

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
